sys_ui_message.message:
You may notice that the number in the users related list not match the sum of numbers in the exam state details. This can happen when you remove a user from a group. This is because the numbers represent different things. The users related list is the number of users in this group. The numbers in the exam line item are how many score records are currently found. If you remove a user from a group, the score record will continue to exist and be linked to this group. You can change that with the field below.

What would you like to do with the score records associated to this user/group when you remove a user from this group and a score record exists? You can:
  • Nothing:Leave the score record attached to this group
  • Remove: Delete the score record regardless of state
  • Remove if inactive: Remove the score record only if the exam is Pending, Complete, or Canceled
  • Unlink: "Unlink" the score record from this group and let it continue as a standalone exam
